markets.description: The markets associated with the event

CrossingSubscriptionTypeConfig.description: This subscription will fire an alert if the price crosses the specified threshold in either direction (up or down).
CrossingSubscriptionTypeConfig.title: Crossing

CrossingUpSubscriptionTypeConfig.description: This subscription will fire an alert if the price crosses the specified threshold upward.
CrossingUpSubscriptionTypeConfig.title: Crossing Up

CrossingDownSubscriptionTypeConfig.description: This subscription will fire an alert if the price crosses the specified threshold downward.
CrossingDownSubscriptionTypeConfig.title: Crossing Down

CrossingStepSubscriptionTypeConfig.description: This subscription will fire an alert if the price crosses threshold levels in predefined steps.
CrossingStepSubscriptionTypeConfig.title: Crossing Step

GreaterThanSubscriptionTypeConfig.description: This subscription will fire an alert if the price is greater than the specified threshold.
GreaterThanSubscriptionTypeConfig.title: Greater Than

LessThanSubscriptionTypeConfig.description: This subscription will fire an alert if the price is less than the specified threshold.
LessThanSubscriptionTypeConfig.title: Less Than

EventAndMarketOpenStatusChangesSubscript.description: This subscription will fire an alert when new events and markets are created or when existing ones close.
EventAndMarketOpenStatusChangesSubscript.title: Event and Market Status Changes

enum: New or closed events and markets

post.description: Search API for events using keyphrases.
Search API for events using tag slugs.

Creates a subscription that monitors all existing and newly added markets in a watchlist. \nThe subscription *       will trigger an alert based on the specified trigger conditions.
Currently, the alert can be one or more webhooks.

event_status_changes.summary: New or closed events and markets

subscriptionTypeConfig.type: New or closed events and markets
New or closed events and markets

watchlist_not_found.summary: Watchlist not found or doesn't belong to user

value.error: Only one EVENT_AND_MARKET_OPEN_STATUS_CHANGES subscription is allowed per watchlist

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

get.description:
Retrieves all watchlists for the authenticated user, or a specific watchlist if ID is provided.
Returns watchlists sorted by creation date (most recent first).

parameters.name: watchlistId
parameters.description: Optional watchlist ID. If not provided, returns all user's watchlists.

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

post.description:
Creates a new watchlist by searching for events using tag slugs and automatically 
populating the watchlist with matching events and markets. This is a simplified 
way to create watchlists based on predefined tags.

value.error: Watchlist name must be between 1 and 100 characters
Watchlist name must be between 1 and 100 characters

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

value.error: User not found and/or invalid API key

post.description:
Permanently deletes a watchlist owned by the authenticated user. This action cannot be undone.
Only the owner of the watchlist can delete it.

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

404.description: Watchlist not found or doesn't belong to user

value.error: Watchlist not found or already deleted
